page.title: 15Clubs and Organisations.
page.content: { Brownies}groups are for girls from 7-10.{Guides}cater for 10-13 year olds{.Cubs & Scouts}are for boys. All meet in the {village hall}.In the village playing fields there is a {tennis club}for juniors and adults, as well as{soccer and cricket clubs}for all ages. A {ballet club}for girls meets on a Monday & Thursday. The {bowling club}is open daily in the summer.On Saturday there is a{gym club for 4-11 year olds.The{church}has a {choir},a{children's church},and a {Pathfinder club}for teenagers.Women have a choice of{Women's Institute, {Young Wives, or National Housewives {Register.}Old people go to{Darby & {Joan Club.}.There is a{sailing club nearby ,a{jogging club},and{keep-fit {club .Community Care}look after needy people.
